summary.span: 表示 類別的執行個體的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每個代表集合中的 擴充性項目加入至，和指定的 MIME 型別對應。Each within the collection represents an extensibility element added to a , and specifies the MIME type for a corresponding . 如需有關指定的 XML Web 服務通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用的屬性和方法所公開`MimePartCollection`類別。The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `MimePartCollection` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已經在集合中的項目數等於集合的容量，容量加倍插入新項目之前，會自動重新配置內部的陣列。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`參數等於、`mimePart`參數加入至結尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `mimePart` parameter is added to the end of the . 向下移動以容納新項目插入點後的項目。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples 下列範例示範的典型用法`Insert`方法。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Insert` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 請依照下列所移除的項目`MimePart`向上移動以佔用空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed `MimePart` move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples 下列範例示範的典型用法`Remove`方法。The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Remove` method.
